General.Description: Such a social currency, Reddcoin has been enriched by users's social lives and contribution. It makes digital currency easy for individuals as well as the commumity. By integrating a digital platform with all major social networks, Reddcoin achieves has made the process of interexchange money easily and given them the rewards. Besides, on the road to tipping bandwagon, ReddCoin is making itself the social network donation go to default.
General.Features: The Proof of Stake Velocity of Redddcoin is an innovative, which encourages both ownership and activity. Reddcoin also give permission for participants to seamlessly exchanges digital currency by decentralized Tip Platform. Moreover, the users associate a username with rich information including public keys and social network identities by unique service called Redd-ID. Last but not least, it also brings about the blockchain level and State-of-the-art wallet that provides a number of social features needed.
General.Technology: By improving on various aspects of Bitcoin, Reddcoin has many new and updated technology such as new hash functions instead of SHA256 and new mechanism instead of Proof-of-Work. Moreover, with a 1 minute block time and block retargeting,a Scrypt coin may be used on kimoto's gravity well. Finanlly, Reddcoin combines an innovative PoS velocity algorithm that allows customers to have the best platform to buy and sell the transactions.
